name: DMPS
body:
# Who Am I
**C**almly solving mysteries, I am a problem solver.

**O**ptimizing my inventions, I am a tester.

**D**elving into the intricacies of my creations, I am a debugger. 

**E**volving to match the difficulty of my task, I am a learner.
***

# Notable Projects
* Pokemon IoT – a starter for building your own Pokemon games in Unity3d which connect with IoT devices
* CharityBeSure – an application for monitoring and exposing the transactions of charities. Built in Pure JavaScript and Bootstrap.
* Bad Eggs – an application for passively monitoring a companies transactions with potentially sanctioned individuals. Built using Python and the Open Bank Project.

***

# Awards
* First Prize – Startup Bootcamp Fintechathon 2016
* First Prize – EyeFocus IdeaHack 2016
* Best Answer to Challenge - TADHack 2016

***

# Articles
* [Techcrunch](https://techcrunch.com/2015/12/06/human-code-project/)
